name: Notifications Hub, System Monitoring & Billing Management Suite
changes: Enterprise Communication, Monitoring & Billing System: Built **NOTIFICATIONS & MESSAGING HUB MODULE** (3 pages) - Notification Center with unified inbox featuring 7 category tabs (All/System/Sales/Inventory/Deliveries/Finance/Workflow Automations), notification cards with icon/title/description/timestamp/read status, mark as read functionality (individual and bulk), infinite scroll support, search and filter capabilities, unread counter badge, color-coded notifications by type (blue for system, green for sales, orange for inventory, purple for deliveries, red for finance, pink for workflow), gradient backgrounds, 8 notification types tracked; Notification Settings with channel toggles (Email/SMS/In-App/Push notifications), category-specific preferences table with individual channel controls for 7 categories (Sales & Invoices, Inventory & Stock, Payments & Finance, Workflow Automations, Deliveries & Logistics, HR & Payroll, System Updates), quiet hours feature with time range picker (start/end time selectors), test notification button, save settings with toast feedback, switch components for all toggles; Internal Messaging with Slack-like responsive UI, 3-column layout (chat list sidebar, main chat window, conversation info panel), chat types (Direct Messages, Departments, Channels), real-time message display with avatar bubbles, online status indicators (green dot), message timestamps, seen indicators (double checkmark), unread message badges, search functionality, new message button, file attachment support (Paperclip icon), emoji reactions (Smile icon), voice notes (Mic icon), message input with Enter to send, typing indicators, chat header with voice/video call buttons (Phone/Video icons), conversation info panel with shared files section, gradient message bubbles (purple-pink for sent, white for received), left sidebar with tabs and search. Created **AUDIT TRAILS & SYSTEM MONITORING MODULE** (3 pages) - Audit Logs page already exists at /audit/logs with user/action/module/timestamp/device/IP tracking, Session Monitor renamed from /audit/sessions to /audit/session-monitor showing active sessions with device type/browser/login time/last activity/force logout, System Health Monitor with real-time metrics (CPU/Memory/Storage usage gauges with circular progress indicators and percentage bars), auto-refresh toggle (5-second intervals), 3 system metric gauges (CPU 55%, Memory 68%, Storage 42%) with color-coded thresholds (green <60%, orange 60-80%, red >80%), CPU usage trend line chart (7 time points), API response times horizontal bar chart (5 endpoints: /api/sales 120ms, /api/inventory 85ms, /api/customers 95ms, /api/reports 250ms, /api/auth 45ms), error rate tracking by module (5 modules with error counts and percentages), recent system logs viewer (5 log levels: INFO/WARNING/ERROR with color-coded badges), export report button, animated refresh icon, gradient progress bars, Recharts integration for all visualizations. Implemented **SUBSCRIPTION & BILLING MANAGEMENT MODULE (UGX ONLY)** (5 pages) - Subscription Overview with current plan display (Business plan UGX 350,000/month in gradient card), next billing date (2026-01-07), plan status badge (ACTIVE), 4 usage limit cards (Users 12/25, Branches 3/10, Automations 15/50, Storage 45/100 GB) with circular progress indicators and percentage bars, approaching limit warnings (80% threshold with orange AlertTriangle, 95% with red), trend indicators per metric (+2 users this month, +5 GB storage), payment method summary (MTN Mobile Money default), quick action cards linking to Billing History/Usage Analytics/Payment Methods, upgrade/manage payment CTAs; Pricing Plans with 3 pricing tiers (Starter UGX 120,000/month: 5 users/2 branches/10 automations/25GB, Business UGX 350,000/month: 25 users/10 branches/50 automations/100GB - MOST POPULAR badge, Enterprise UGX 900,000/month: unlimited users/branches/automations/500GB), billing cycle toggle (Monthly/Annual with 15% discount badge), annual pricing calculation (price * 12 * 0.85), feature lists with checkmark icons, gradient plan cards with hover effects, centered layout, dark mode variants, current plan indicator (disabled button), custom plan CTA section, feature comparison link; Payment Methods with payment method cards (Mobile Money: MTN/Airtel with logos, Bank Account: Stanbic Bank), phone numbers and account numbers masked (‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢ format), default method badge, set as default functionality, delete method with confirmation modal, add payment method modal with type selection (Mobile Money: provider dropdown MTN/Airtel + phone input, Bank Account: bank dropdown + account number + account name), MTN yellow logo emoji üü°, Airtel red logo emoji üî¥, bank building emoji üè¶, payment security info card, delete confirmation modal with trash icon; Billing History with invoices table (5 invoices from Aug-Dec 2025), invoice viewer modal with full invoice layout (XHETON branding, invoice number XHET-INV-XXXXXX, billed to section, invoice date, billing period, line items table, subtotal/tax/total calculations, payment status indicator with green badge 'Payment Received', download PDF button), search and filter functionality, summary cards (Total Paid UGX 1,290,000, This Year UGX 1,290,000, Next Payment Jan 7 2026), status badges (paid/pending/overdue), download all button, DataTable component integration; Usage Analytics with 4 usage metrics (Active Users 12/25, Branches 3/10, Automations 15/50, Storage 45/100 GB) showing current values, limits, percentages, trends, and warnings, period selector (week/month/quarter/year), storage usage trend line chart (6 months Jul-Dec showing 25GB‚Üí45GB growth), user activity trend line chart (8‚Üí12 users growth), automation usage by category bar chart (5 categories: Sales 5, Inventory 4, Finance 3, HR 2, Logistics 1), usage alerts card with upgrade CTA when approaching limits (orange/red gradient background), projected usage section with calendar-based predictions (storage reaching 60GB by Jan 2026, user growth forecast), Recharts integration for all visualizations. **NAVIGATION UPDATES** - Added 3 new sidebar groups with Lucide icons: Communications (Bell icon: Notification Center/Notification Settings/Messages), Monitoring (Activity icon: Audit Logs/Session Monitor/System Health), Billing (CardIcon/CreditCard icon: Subscription Overview/Plans (UGX)/Payment Methods/Invoices/Usage). All groups maintain accordion behavior (only one open at a time), default to closed state, smooth expand/collapse transitions. **NEW ICONS** - Added Lucide React icons: Cpu (system health CPU gauge), CardIcon (billing module), renamed /audit/sessions to /audit/session-monitor. **UGX CURRENCY MAINTAINED** - All financial references continue exclusive UGX (Uganda Shillings) format 'UGX X,XXX,XXX' - pricing plans (Starter UGX 120K, Business UGX 350K, Enterprise UGX 900K), invoices (UGX 350,000 monthly charges), billing history totals (UGX 1,290,000), annual pricing with 15% discount calculations. Zero KES or USD references. All 11 new pages follow DRAIS architecture: Next.js App Router 'use client' components, shadcn/ui (Card/Button/Input/Switch/Label/DataTable), Framer Motion animations (stagger delays, fade-in, scale modals, slide-in panels), Lucide React icons throughout, Recharts for analytics (LineChart/BarChart with gradients), consistent design (rounded-3xl cards, gradient CTAs from-purple-600 to-pink-600, color-coded status badges, circular progress gauges, responsive grids, modal overlays with backdrop blur). Updated version from 0.0.013 to 0.0.014. System now provides: Real-Time Notifications (multi-channel preferences, quiet hours, unified inbox), Internal Messaging (Slack-like chat with DMs/channels, file sharing, reactions), System Health Monitoring (CPU/memory/storage gauges, API performance, error tracking, log viewer), Subscription Management (plan tiers, usage limits with warnings, billing cycles), Payment Processing (Mobile Money MTN/Airtel, Bank Accounts, payment method management), Invoice Management (billing history, PDF invoices, payment tracking), Usage Analytics (metered usage charts, projected growth, limit alerts) plus all existing modules: Workflow Automation, Document Management, Support Tickets, Manufacturing, CRM, Assets, Supply Chain, Procurement, Accounting, HR, Payroll, Logistics, Audit, Membership, and Communication.
